original_title: Four Tremors Along Mid-Indian Ridge; No Impact on Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Geological Survey and Mines Bureau's Seismic Monitoring Center said that four tremors were recorded from the Mid-Indian Ridge located on the Indian Ocean on Friday (29) morning.
It added that these tremors have had no impact on Sri Lanka.
